name: Updated Shepherds Pie
author: Kraft
summary: An easy shepherd's pie made with lean ground beef has a light but flavorful layer of creamy mashed potatoes on top.
ingredients: 1 ¼ pounds red potatoes, cut into chunks
4 cups frozen mixed vegetables (carrots, corn, green beans, peas), thawed
¾ cup fat-free reduced-sodium beef broth
¾ cup BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat or KNUDSEN Light Sour Cream
½ cup KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese, divided
directions: Cook potatoes and garlic in boiling water in large saucepan 20 min
Meanwhile, brown meat in large nonstick skillet
Add mixed vegetables, broth and ketchup; cook 5 min
Add sour cream; mash until potatoes are smooth and mixture is well blended
Spoon meat mixture into 8-inch square baking dish; cover with potatoes
Top with remaining cheese; bake 2 min
